summary.purpose: Provides four coloured motorcycle SVG icon generator functions (red, yellow, green, gray) conforming to the VehicleSvg signature for use as map markers and menu icons.
summary.problem_solved: Supplies the motorcycle vehicle type's state-specific icon variants so map and menu components can reflect real-time ignition and speed state visually.

exports.name: redMotorcycleIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a red motorcycle SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: yellowMotorcycleIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a yellow motorcycle SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: greenMotorcycleIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a green motorcycle SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: grayMotorcycleIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a gray motorcycle SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

symbols.name: redMotorcycleIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a red motorcycle SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: Red motorcycle icon SVG element. Red indicates ignition is off.

details.what_it_does: Generates a motorcycle SVG icon in red, indicating ignition is off.

minimal_correct.title: Render a red motorcycle icon
minimal_correct.code:
import { redMotorcycleIcon } from 'akeyless-assets-commons';

const icon = redMotorcycleIcon('30', '30', '#FF0000', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');

symbols.name: yellowMotorcycleIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a yellow motorcycle SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: Yellow motorcycle icon SVG element. Yellow indicates idling.

details.what_it_does: Generates a motorcycle SVG icon in yellow, indicating idle state.

minimal_correct.title: Render a yellow motorcycle icon
minimal_correct.code:
import { yellowMotorcycleIcon } from 'akeyless-assets-commons';

const icon = yellowMotorcycleIcon('30', '30', '#FFFF00', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');

params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

details.what_it_does: Generates a motorcycle SVG icon in green, indicating the vehicle is actively moving.

params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.
